Actions.Name: Suppressive Fire
Actions.Description: The Gunwright marks a foe in range 8.
Actions.Mark: While marked, that foe take 2 piercing damage every time they take an action, as long as they are not in cover from the Gunwright.

Actions.Name: Overwatch
Actions.Description: While in this stance, the Gunwright targets a blast 1 area anywhere on the battlefield. Any foe that ends their turn in the area must save, taking [D]+[fray] piercing damage from the Gunwright on a failed save. Using this ability again retargets the area. If the Gunwright is shoved, blinded, or stunned, this stance ends.
